summary: A GrindStone for Breezhome in Whiterun. It allows you to upgrade weapons at home.
descriptionHtml:
Adds GrindStone to your house in Whiterun. You can find it under the stairs.

You\'ll probably need to purchase Dining Room Decorations house improvements for it to appear.

Install:
unpack and place BreezehomeGrindStone.esp into your ..\\skyrim\\Data folder.
activate in the launcher.

uninstall
remove BreezehomeGrindStone.esp from your Data folder
author: roumor
